DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine psychological sociological factor predispose post-mastectomy pain syndrome surgery woman resectable breast cancer . Secondary - Determine psychological sociological factor predispose post-surgical pain patient . - Evaluate emotional distress time patient . - Evaluate acute chronic pain time patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients complete multiple questionnaire , include Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HAD ) , Maudsley Personality Inventory ( MPI ) , PCS , QLQ-C30 , evaluate psychological variable ( alexithymia , neurosis , repression negative emotion , solicitude , dramatization , emotional distress ) quality life . Post-mastectomy chronic pain ( PMCP ) syndrome measure immediately surgery 24 hour , day 6 , 5 month post-surgery . A subgroup patient ( 20 PMCP 20 without PMCP ) follow month 5 6 month post-surgery medication use , pathological problem , morbid event , family history , environmental factor . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 150 patient accrue study .
